Hey!

Welcome to my portfolio,

About me.

"During my journey I studied electronic and digital systems, which allowed me to learn more about computer science and how it works.
Later, my love of art and creativity led me to pursue professional training in music.
That's how I decided to combine my passions for digital technologies and creativity to become a Web Developer".

01.

I've always been attracted to designing websites and their interactions. That's why I pay particular attention to animations, performances, and design in my projects.
I like to create new experiences and ensure the perfect pixel layout, to create the best possible user experience.
I'm also committed to accessibility and SEO so that my projects are accessible to everyone and for everyone.

02.

I started learning web development on my own for six months full-time. Then decided to take the Openclassrooms web developer training course for nine months to validate my skills and learn new things. Especially by creating projects that meet the needs of the current market.
I usually work in vanilla javascript, but I'm always curious to learn new things that can improve my knowledge and possibilities in my working environment.
